channel.title: Launching a B2B SaaS product - lessons learned
channel.description:
So you’re interested in learning how to launch a SaaS product? We are too! What could be better than shipping? Whether you're an entrepreneur, or a product manager in an established company, chances are that you will be faced with a situation where you need to get the product out of the door.
Read the whole article http://www.screenful.me/blog/2014/12/7/launching-a-b2b-saas-product
